incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

We will be performing a routine maintenance in the Europe (France 3) (fr-3.platform.sh) region to optimize the cloud infrastructure. 

All projects and environments will continue to function during the maintenance; however, at one point, you may notice increased deployment times.

If you have any questions about this maintenance, please contact Platform.sh Support by logging in to https://accounts.platform.sh and visiting the Support Center.  You can also access our public chat channel using https://chat.platform.sh.

Sincerely,
Platform.sh Support Team
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

We will be performing a routine maintenance in the Europe (Germany) (de-2.platform.sh) region to optimize the cloud infrastructure. 

All projects and environments will continue to function during the maintenance; however, at one point, you may notice increased deployment times.

If you have any questions about this maintenance, please contact Platform.sh Support by logging in to https://accounts.platform.sh and visiting the Support Center.  You can also access our public chat channel using https://chat.platform.sh.

Sincerely,
Platform.sh Support Team

We will be performing maintenance in the USA-2 (East 2) (us-2.platform.sh) region to release the latest features, bug fixes and performance updates.

All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade; however, at one point, a short downtime of no more than 10 minutes will be experienced. Integrations and webhooks may fail during the maintenance, and you may notice increased deployment times.

If you have any questions about this maintenance, please contact Platform.sh Support by logging in to https://accounts.platform.sh and visiting the Support Center.  You can also access our public chat channel using https://chat.platform.sh.

Sincerely,
Platform.sh Support Team
